Reference

All functions

ConvexCombCopula()

Convex Combination of copulas.

Cort()

The Cort estimator

CortForest()

Bagged Cort estimates

biv_rho()

Spearman's rho matrix of a copula

biv_tau()

Kendall's tau matrix of a copula

cbCopula()

Checkerboard copulas

cbkmCopula()

Checkerboard with known margins

constraint_infl()

Constraint influence of the model

dCopula()

Copula density

kendall_func()

Kendall function

loss()

Loss of the model

pCopula()

Copula density

project_on_dims()

Projection on smaller dimensions

quad_norm()

Quadratic norm of the model

quad_prod()

Quadratic product of 2 trees

quad_prod_with_data()

Quadratic product with data of the model

rCopula()

Copula random variables simulation

vCopula()

Copula volume on hyper-boxes
